semantics.label: Single Choice Set
semantics.description: Enter your questions in the single choice set.

fields.label: Text shown when connecting to server
Message shown when content was deleted while user was active
fields.default: The content was deleted or updated. Please refresh this page to try reloading it.

fields.label: Message shown when there was a connection error
fields.default: There was an error connecting to the shared state server:

fields.label: Text shown to student when waiting for the teacher to start the quiz
fields.default: Please wait for your teacher to start the quiz...

fields.label: Text shown to the teacher when the quiz has not begun and there are no participants
Text shown when the quiz has not begun and there are participants
Text explaining to the teacher what to do before the quiz has started
fields.default: Press Start when all participants have joined.

fields.label: Label of the "Start" button shown before the quiz has started
A textual representation of the current question number
Label of the "Show answer" button when displaying a question (teacher)
Label of the "Show scores" button when display question's answer (teacher)
Text shown to student when the question answer is being shown, but student hasn't given an answer
Title of the scores screen for students
Text in score screen when student hasn't played yet
fields.default: You have not played in this quiz yet.

fields.label: Title of the scores screen for teachers
Label of the "Next question" button in the scores screen
Label for the final score
Text in final score screen when student hasn't played
fields.default: You haven't played in this quiz!

fields.label: Label for 'Place' in the final score table
Label for 'Name' in the (final) score table
Label for 'Score' in the (final) score table
Label for the 'Play again' button in the final score screen
